name: Notion Creator’s ChatGPT Cheatsheet
description: Notion Creators are overwhelmed all the time. features: Over 150+ ChatGPT prompts to master copywriting and captioning in every platform and content; Verbs and tone of voice ideas for ChatGPT; How do I use it?As long as you have a Notion account, all you have to do is download the page and hit duplicate at the top right of the template.; I don't have a paid account, does this still work?Yes!
